text: Josep Maria Subirachs i Sitjar (; 11 March 1927 - 7 April 2014) was a Spanish sculptor and painter of the late 20th century. His best known work is probably the Passion Façade of the basilica of the Sagrada Família in Barcelona. Subirachs was born in Barcelona. He died there from Parkinson's disease on 7 April 2014. He was 87 years old. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1927 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Deaths from Parkinson's disease Category:Disease-related deaths in Barcelona Category:Artists from Barcelona Category:Spanish painters Category:Spanish sculptors Category:20th- century painters Category:21st-century painters
title: Josep Maria Subirachs
